actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 with respect to the deduction for moving expenses.

summary.text: Allows a tax deduction under the Internal Revenue Code for moving expenses incurred by Armed Forces members. Defines allowable moving expenses. Makes special provisions for members of the Armed Force assigned to a tour of duty outside the United States or in Alaska.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 with respect to the deduction for moving expenses.
